A Black Chest with black locks can be found in the Shade Catacombs during the Shades of Mort'ton minigame. A black key black is needed to open the chest, after which the key dissolves.

Contents

  • 1 Possible rewards
    • 1.1 Locks
    • 1.2 Splitbark scrolls
    • 1.3 Weapons
    • 1.4 Armour
    • 1.5 Other
    • 1.6 Tertiary
  • 2 Trivia

Possible rewards[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified. The average Black Chest (black) opening is worth 2,078.35.

Locks[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Black locks11/60; 1/58[d 1]13,4411,920
  1. ↑ The drop rate of black locks are increased when wearing a ring of wealth.

Splitbark scrolls[edit | edit source]

There is a 1/183 (1/181 if wearing a ring of wealth) chance of rolling the splitbark scrolls drop table, if the previous tables are not reached. The tree wizards' journal and bloody notes will be given out only if the player has not received the books.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Tree wizards' journal11/372.2; 1/368.35[d 1]Not sold1
Runescroll of swampbark11/372.2; 1/368.35[d 2]2,785240
Bloody notes11/372.2; 1/368.35[d 3]Not sold1
Runescroll of bloodbark11/372.2; 1/368.35[d 2]3,125360
  1. ↑ Players will only receive the tree wizards' journal once; subsequent rolls will give players a runescroll of swampbark instead.
  2. ↑ 2.0 2.1 The drop rate of runescrolls are increased when wearing a ring of wealth.
  3. ↑ Players will only receive the bloody notes once; subsequent rolls will give players a runescroll of bloodbark instead.

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Coins1–1,000Common[d 1]1–1,0001–1,000
Flamtaer bag11/2[d 2]Not soldN/A

  3. ↑ The chest will always give either a Flamtaer bag or swamp paste.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • This is the only chest used in the Shades of Mort'ton minigame where the colour of the lock is the same as the colour of the chest.
